sentences.english: This can be called a desire for "honesty" in the design.
sentences.chinese: 這可以被稱爲一種“實誠”的設計。

sentences.english: Faith in Don’s judgment is all but absolute.
Yet she was also independent and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她卻也獨立而實誠。

sentences.english: The rich people honest, the brothers is sincere.
sentences.chinese: 富貴這人實誠，對兄弟是真心實意。

sentences.english: You are I No. 1 old friend, you belong honest man, only go no chance.
sentences.chinese: 你是我最好的老朋友，人挺實誠，只是運氣不好。
